INSERT INTO PROD_CRAFWORK_PLM ( ID, PROD_NO, MID_PROD_NO, CRAFWORK_ID, CRAFWORK_DESC, PRICE, QUARTERS_EMP, MODEL_NO, BEF_CRAFWORK, CARF_SEQ, AMOUNT, UNIT, MAC_MINUTES, EMP_MINUTES, IS_CHECK, DAY_AMOUNT, REMARK, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{crafworkDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{quartersEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{befCrafwork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carfSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{macMinutes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empMinutes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isCheck,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PROD_CRAFWORK_PLM.nextval as id FROM dual
